analysis.key_quote: DO NOT re-institute SCHEDULE F. You are handing the reins of our government over to whoever has the greatest ability to corrupt our system.
analysis.rationale: The comment explicitly opposes the re-institution of Schedule F, highlighting concerns about the politicization of federal employment and the loss of competent, nonpartisan federal employees. It emphasizes the importance of maintaining a merit-based system and warns against the dangers of corruption.
